Posts.Content: Dec 15, 2016 09:38AM sballan wrote: Regarding a second opinion, I would get one. I got a second opinion and surprisingly each had a totally different treatment plan. I had a low Oncotype score which made me happy, but one dr. recommends chemo anyway. At least you know that you have more aggressive options to take. For me, because of cancer in one of my lymph nodes it is still unclear what treatment path to take. Hang in there.
Posts.Title: Hi. I'm new. My oncotype is freaking me out. jamiens Warrior4sararyan
